author: By DEE-ANN DURBIN AP Business Writer
title: Coke volume plunges 25% in April; hopes for 2nd half rebound
description: Coca-Cola's global volume has tumbled 25% in April as the coronavirus pandemic gripped large swaths of the world population.
content: In this Tuesday, March 24, 2020, photo released by China's Xinhua News Agency, a worker wearing a face mask drives a forklift at a Swire Coca-Cola Beverages Hubei Limited plant in Wuhan in central China's Hubei Province. According to Chinese state media, the … [+2066 chars]
